review_blob: Excellent beer for the style. It has the classic saison funky/slightly spicy taste but the hops really stick out. Great beer.
Drinks very much like a barleywine, almost tastes like Sucaba.,.very solid beer.
beer_name: Imperial Oak Barrel Aged Odins Beard

review_blob: This is everything a DIPA should be. The hops really start out center stage as all IPAs should. Very fragrant citrus, not a whole lot of floral notes. The palate is filled with grapefruit and orange zest. Mouthfeel is very playful. The only thing I want more about this beer is its availability.

I really dont get any chocolate anywhere near this beer. I almost get a peppery note, or a smoky note. The beer most closely resembles a Tootsie Roll...not all that happy, even though I got it for my girlfriends birthday.
